memberdef.name: FAIL_ALLOC_RET_MSG_FMT
memberdef.initializer: "sys_bitarray_alloc with region size %i returned incorrect result"

memberdef.name: FAIL_ALLOC_OFFSET_MSG_FMT
memberdef.initializer: "sys_bitarray_alloc with region size %i gave incorrect offset"

memberdef.name: FAIL_FREE_MSG_FMT
memberdef.initializer: "sys_bitarray_free with region size %i and offset %i failed"

briefdescription.para: Test find MSB and LSB operations.

detaileddescription.para: Verify the functions that find out the most significiant bit and least significiant bit work as expected.
